title: (x) sans on website for DR (Danish Radio) - DRi (custom font) {Thomas Hoedholt}
content:
I can not seem to figure this one out…

Anyone?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=1_1.gif) | 6.64 KB |
author: tombas

comments.content: [FF Signa](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111115008/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.11204.0.0) by Ole Søndergaard is quite similar in style. It has a different “l” though

Nicolai!

You are quite right. I think it is a danish design like Signa. I found it on the website for DR (Danish Radio). I know their coporate font is DRmonoline, but that is not what is used here.

It’s a custommade font “DRi” for DR interactive services. It’s done by Mads Quistgaard (of pleks.dk) whom i share officespace with…

so yeah… it’s “DRi”
